abilities.title: [tactical]Pride of the Mandalore
abilities.text: At the start of this Unit's activation, choose another allied Mandalorian character. The chosen character may . Jet pack Each character in this Unit may . Mandalorians are stronger together After this Unit makes a move action, it may use this ability. If a character in this Unit is within 2 of another allied Mandalorian character, this Unit immediately makes a focus action. Mandalore will survive After this Unit makes a focus action, one character in this Unit may and . Some of us serve a higher purpose Allied Madalorian characters within 3 of this Unit that are contesting one or more Active objectives have Protection and Steadfast .
